name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dynamic Senior Field Engineer with a rich background in software engineering and 8 years of experience, I excel in problem solving and communication to deliver exceptional customer service. My expertise in **electrotechnics**, **mechatronics**, and **mechanical systems** ensures I bring a comprehensive approach to maintenance and technical support.
I have a strong foundation in full-stack development using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, enabling me to create high-performance solutions. Leveraging technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I build applications that integrate seamlessly with hardware controllers and systems.
With significant cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS**, I am well-equipped to handle the software aspects of electromechanical systems. My commitment to flexibility and adaptive problem-solving makes me a vital asset in dynamic field environments, ready to tackle challenges and drive results.

Designed and implemented mechatronic systems to optimize performance and integrate new technologies, reinforcing flexibility to meet evolving client needs.
Collaborated with mechanical engineers on system optimization projects, focusing on integrating electrotechnics to improve overall system efficiency.
Led continuous improvement initiatives utilizing performance data, enhancing system reliability by **15%** through proactive maintenance strategies and upgrades.
Developed and documented maintenance procedures and protocols, ensuring compliance with industry standards and facilitating training for incoming field engineers.
Conducted field testing and evaluations of new technologies, providing detailed feedback for software improvements and interface enhancements with technical teams.
Utilized advanced problem-solving techniques to resolve technical issues in real-time during field operations, contributing to **98%** first-time fix rates.

Utilized **electrotechnics** and **mechatronics** to design and implement advanced controllers for complex systems, ensuring seamless integration and operation.
Provided high-level **software** support and maintenance, achieving a **99%** system uptime, while enhancing operational efficiency and troubleshooting processes.
Demonstrated strong **problem-solving** abilities by diagnosing technical issues in real-time, leading to a **30%** reduction in downtime.
Communicated effectively with clients to understand their needs, providing exceptional **customer service** to turn feedback into actionable improvements, resulting in a **25%** increase in customer satisfaction scores.
Exhibited **flexibility** in adapting to evolving project requirements, managing multiple priorities simultaneously while delivering projects on time and within budget.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions tailored to meet unique customer specifications, driving successful project outcomes and repeat business.

Utilized **software** skills to diagnose and resolve technical issues in electrotechnics and mechatronics systems, ensuring optimal performance and uptime across mechanical and electronic components.
Delivered exceptional **customer service** and communication skills while collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement and maintain cutting-edge controller solutions for varied applications.
Executed maintenance strategies for complex mechanical systems, enhancing reliability by **15%** and reducing downtime by **20%** through effective problem-solving approaches and proactive interventions.
Demonstrated flexibility in adapting to evolving project requirements and technological advancements, contributing to diverse engineering projects that include real-time data monitoring and adjustment.
Analyzed system performance metrics, implementing strategic improvements that resulted in a **30%** increase in system efficiency and satisfaction among stakeholders.
Coordinated training sessions for junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and knowledge sharing within the team, resulting in improved project delivery times by **25%**.
Led troubleshooting efforts on-site, applying robust software tools to address electrotechnical challenges promptly, elevating customer experience by ensuring high service reliability.
Implemented project management methodologies to oversee field engineering tasks, enhancing project tracking and reporting processes to deliver projects on time and within budget.
